subject: Re: [junit] About Struts Action Testing
msgSnippet: On Sat, 27 Aug 2005 19:57:29 +0200, Soheil Dowlatshahi ... Have a look at Mockrunner http://mockrunner.sourceforge.net/ and the example for testing Struts
messageBody:
On Sat, 27 Aug 2005 19:57:29 +0200, Soheil Dowlatshahi
<soheildowlatshahi@...> wrote:

> Hello
>
> I have read your currently subject about Web Unit
> testing. I don't know that is it possible to use these
> tools or some thing like them for testing Struts
> Action classes?

Have a look at Mockrunner http://mockrunner.sourceforge.net/ and the
example for testing Struts Action classes at
http://mockrunner.sourceforge.net/examples.html

--
Stein Erik Berget
